entity.name: Narendra Modi
entity.description: Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi

text:
@narendramodi Honorable Prime Minister,
Due to COVID-19 I am facing a lots of problem in *INDORE* City, Madhya Pradesh..I am not able to get the basic necessities, so it's my kind request to you sir, kindly allow me to reach my home safely i.e in Dist- Kalaburagi,karnataka.
